answers.answer: Lmao soooo true
I ask something earlier never got a reply back seen a post about dying hair so many comments I'm like really lol come on
Because a lot of women don't know the answer. Or they aren't sure if their answer is correct and don't want to give bad advice I know it gets annoying.
Tell me about it.  I got tired of not getting answers on things like pains in my stomach and just looked it up on Google
Preachhhh

Because a lot of people here are first time moms and don't know the answer or can't relate... Im Sorry:/ I'm one of those first time moms who can't answer serious questions about things I don't know. I would if I could.:/
Thank you ladies lol I look on Google to but than I freak myself out lol and I understand I'm a ftm to its just I see the same post everyday about the same thing lol
Lol girl you read my mind I thought I was the only one struggling with that

If you have a serious question that isn't "call the doctor immediately" serious, I would try going to the older age group forums. Just putthat you know its the wrong forum, but you need some help. Like a couple people on this post said, this younger group may only know the answer to the silly questions because we are first timers. The older ladies are more likely to have done this before and might be able to give you a little more insight.

Lol your not the only one..and seriously I didn't say it was you ain't got to be so rude all I said was the serious question get put last while the same question gets answer every time I've some that has gone through the same thing what I'm doing but there are ftm on the age group to not just this one
I wasn't being rude. I was just saying that there is a better chance of getting help from the older ladies. I know there are ftm there too, but not as many.
When I had questions about my molar pregnancy.  I posted hereGot a few replies but I posted in the older age group for more advice.Some questions we aren't to Sure about.
Thank you ladies :) and sorry it's just sounds different on the phone just really worried about what could happen if it's not good results :(
Maybe most people don't know the answers to serious questions? :/
what are you worried about? If you don't mind me asking

I had to do the 24 hr urine test cause I have to much protein which my doctor said it's something I've had but they want to make sure everything okay if not and if it's really serious I got to stay at the hospital until my due date which Oct 3rd
they would want to admit you in the hospital now and keep you till October?
Yeah I get the results back in a day or two but they put me on bed rest and keep a eye on the baby cause it can cause her to come early monitor me and baby

protein in urine as a sign of preeclampsia. But if they catch it early enough a long the doctors are very good about keeping an eye on it and keeping it under control so there really isn't too much to worry about.was your doctor worried about it?

there are a lot of reasons why there could be protein in urine. But if they're able to catch it early enough along they should be able to prevent a baby for coming early.Don't stress to much hunI'm sure everything will work out
The girl that was there wasn't my original doctor so it's kinda hard to say if she was or not I'm trying to keep positive thoughts but it's there always that what if and thank you I hope so
I has protein in my urine early on in my pregnancy but it went away. It's been good ever sense so don'. Worry it could go away and if not they will take great care of u
I guess it's something I've had but they wasn't concerned until now hopefully it's still in the early stages of it did they give you anything for it ??
Nope did take anything for it. It went away and has been fine since then Idk if they prescribe anything for it
That's good hopefully everything turns out fine :)

Its all good. I reread my comment and I cab see where it mighr have seemed snippy over the phone. No hard feelings. (: I had to do the same test and everything turned out fine. Just relax and take care of yourself. Keep your chin up. (:

Ladies please remember this is a social media not a doctors office.. if u are getting upset with a stranger not answering ur questions just remember they are not doctors they ggive their opinions or advice. Ive seen someone give advice that was completely wrong and the person went with it because they were so worried about someone answering them
It's all good its just scary not knowing I'm sure it will be but I'm just preparing myself in case it isn't :)

question: Is it when people post something that's serious even myself it gets over looked but someone can post about asking if they can dye their hair or something and it gets some many comments???
title: why
